subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Danielle Donehew is the assistant commissioner for Big East women’s basketball, and a disciple of the former Tennessee coach Pat Summitt. The N.C.A.A. tournament has had a bittersweet pull on her loyalties.
snippet: Danielle Donehew is the assistant commissioner for Big East women’s basketball, and a disciple of the former Tennessee coach Pat Summitt. The N.C.A.A. tournament has had a bittersweet pull on her loyalties.
